name: Super Arcade Boy in Goodbye Greenies
name_original: Super Arcade Boy in Goodbye Greenies
description:
A Retro Style Classic Shoot'em Up!

Super Arcade Boy is BACK!

In this second installment of the series, fly Super Arcade Boy through 8 levels while defeating waves of aliens and big bosses. Have funny conversations with the alien leader you are destined to defeat, then save the planet from this massive alien invasion!

FEATURES

- 8 Challenging Levels.
- 8 Big Bosses.
- Waves of Aliens.
- Power-ups.
- Funny Conversations with the Alien Leader.
- Retro Style Classic.
- HD Graphics.
- Gamepad Support.

It’s time to tell these Greenies GOODBYE!
